title: Discontent in the Continental Army - why

content.prompt: All of the following contributed to discontent among soldiers in the Continental Army EXCEPT:

choices.label: The soldiers feared for the welfare of families back home.
The army had inadequate arms and ammunition.
The army paid soldiers in depreciated paper money.
The army was inadequately fed and clothed.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
